param.name: description
param.value: HGAP (Hierarchical Genome Assembly Process) performs high quality de novo assembly using a single PacBio library prep. HGAP consists of pre-assembly, de novo assembly with Celera Assembler, and assembly polishing with Quiver.

module.label: PreAssembler Filter v1
module.description: Filter reads for use in the pre-assembly step of HGAP, the hierarchical genome assembly process.

param.name: minSubReadLength
param.label: Minimum Subread Length
param.title: The minimum subread length. Shorter subreads will be filtered and excluded from further analysis.

rule.message: Value must be a positive integer

param.name: readScore
param.label: Minimum Polymerase Read Quality
param.title: The minimum polymerase read quality determines the quality cutoff. Polymerase reads with lower quality will be filtered and excluded from further analysis.

param.name: minLength
param.label: Minimum Polymerase Read Length
param.title: The minimum polymerase read length. Shorter polymerase reads will be excluded from further analysis.

rule.message: Value must be a positive integer

module.label: PreAssembler v1
module.title: Pre-assemble long reads as the first step of the Hierarchical Genome Assembly process (HGAp).

param.name: computeLengthCutoff
param.label: Compute Minimum Seed Read Length
param.title: Compute "Minimum Seed Read Length"

param.name: minLongReadLength
param.label: Minimum Seed Read Length
param.title: Minimum length of reads to use as seeds for pre-assembly

rule.message: Value must be an integer between 1 and 100000

param.name: blasrOpts
param.label: BLASR Options (Advanced)
param.title: The -bestn and -nCandidates options should be approximately equal to the expected seed read coverage

param.name: allowPartialAlignments
param.label: Allow Partial Alignments
param.title: Allows partially aligned reads to participate in pre-assembled read consensus.

param.name: trimFastq
param.label: Trim FASTQ Output
param.title: Trims the low-quality regions from the FASTQ sequence entries.

param.name: useCCS
param.label: Use CCS
param.title: Assemble with CCS reads instead of subreads. In most cases assembling with subreads will be preferred.

module.label: CeleraAssembler v1
module.description: This module wraps the Celera Assembler v7.0

param.name: genomeSize
param.label: Genome Size (bp)
param.title: Approximate genome size in base pairs

rule.message: Must be a value between 1 and 10000000

param.name: asmWatchTime
param.title: Seconds to wait for runCA outputs to be copied into job dir.

param.name: xCoverage
param.label: Target Coverage
param.title: Fold coverage to target when picking frgMinLen for assembly. Typically 15 to 25.

rule.message: Value must be an integer between 10 and 30, inclusive

param.name: ovlErrorRate
param.label: Overlapper error rate
param.title: Overlapper error rate

param.name: ovlMinLen
param.label: Overlapper min length
param.title: Overlaps shorter than this length are not computed.

param.name: merSize
param.label: Overlapper k-mer
param.title: Sets the length of the seeds used by the seed and extend algorithm.

param.name: specInRunCA
param.label: Pre-defined spec file
param.title: Enter the server path to an existing spec file

module.label: BLASR v1
module.description: BLASR maps reads to genomes by finding the highest scoring local alignment or set of local alignments between the read and the genome. The first set of alignments is found by querying an index of the reference genome, and then refining until only high scoring alignments are retained. Additional pulse metrics are loaded into the resulting cmp.h5 file to enable downstream use of the Quiver algorithm.

param.name: maxHits
param.label: Maximum number of hits per read
param.title: The maximum number of matches of each read to the reference sequence that will be evaluated. maxHits should be greater than the expected number of repeats if you want to spread hits out on the genome.

rule.message: Value must be an integer between 0 and 1000

param.name: maxDivergence
param.label: Maximum divergence (%)
param.title: The maximum allowed divergence of a read from the reference sequence.

rule.message: Value must be an integer between 0 and 100

param.name: minAnchorSize
param.label: Minimum anchor size
param.title: The minimum anchor size defines the length of the read that must match against the reference sequence.

rule.message: Value must be an integer between 8 and 30

param.name: samBam
param.label: Write output as a BAM file

param.name: loadPulsesOpts
param.title: The default option of loadPulses is 'byread'. Option 'bymetric' is desined to sacrifice memory for increased speed, especially for jobs of which the number of reference contigs is large.

module.label: AssemblyPolishing v1 (Quiver)
module.description: Polish a pure-PacBio assembly for maximum accuracy using the Quiver algorithm.

param.name: enableMapQVFilter
param.label: Use only unambiguously mapped reads
param.title: Filter out reads with Map QV less than 10. Coverage in repeat regions shorter than the read length will be reduced.
